titles.title: Retirement Savings Modernization Act
Retirement Savings Modernization Act
A bill to amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to clarify the fiduciary duties regarding asset classes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Retirement Savings Modernization Act
This bill specifies that fiduciaries for employee-sponsored retirement plans are permitted to diversify a plan's investments across certain asset classes, such as digital assets, hedge funds, private equity, and venture capital.
